abstract: Letter from New York County Dictrict Attorney Cyrus R Vance Jr responds to May 31 Editorial calling for ban on gravity knives.
lead_paragraph: The Manhattan district attorney, Cyrus R. Vance Jr., takes issue with an editorial that supports legalizing the knives.

headline.main: Keep the Ban on Gravity Knives

snippet: The Manhattan district attorney, Cyrus R. Vance Jr., takes issue with an editorial that supports legalizing the knives.
